Text¶

Draw text on canvas texture, extended from Sprite.

  • Import modules

  • Custom class

  • Create instance

  • Content

  • Color

Import modules¶

import { Text } from '@phaserjs/phaser/gameobjects';

Custom class¶

class MyText extends Text {
    constructor(x, y, content, font, fillStyle) {
        supert(x, y, content, font, fillStyle);
    }

    update(delta, time) {
        super.update(delta, time);
    }
}

Create instance¶

let text = new Text(x, y, content);
// let text = new Text(x, y, content, font, fillStyle);
content

String, or string array.

font

Font string, e.x. '16px monospace'.

fillStyle

Color string, e.x. 'white', or '#fff', or gradient.

Content¶

  • Get

    let content = text.text;

  • Set

    text.setText(content);

    or

    text.text = content;

Color¶

import { SetFillStyle } from '@phaserjs/phaser/gameobjects/text';
SetFillStyle(style, text);
style

Color string, e.x. 'white', or '#fff', or gradient.

text

Text game object.

or

text.fillStyle = style;
text.updateText();
